article.title: Delhi Elections 2015: Facts At A Glance

content.value: The count down for the Delhi assembly elections has begun. Here are some interesting facts for Delhiities before they step out to cast their vote on 7th February, 2015.
“Liked this story? Indiaspend.org is a non-profit, and we depend on readers like you to drive our public-interest journalism efforts. Donate Rs 500; Rs 1,000, Rs 2,000.”
